conditional recurrent neural network.from sentence: Inspired by the recently proposed architectures for machine translation , our model consists of a conditional recurrent neural network , which acts as a decoder to generate the summary of an input sentence , much like a standard recurrent language model .

decoder.from sentence: In addition , at every time step the decoder also takes a conditioning input which is the output of an encoder module .

computes scores over.from sentence: Depending on the current state of the RNN , the encoder computes scores over the words in the input sentence .

uses.from sentence: Lastly , our encoder uses a convolutional network to encode input words .

decoder and encoder.from sentence: Both the decoder and encoder are jointly trained on a data set consisting of sentence - summary pairs .
